description: Defines a health check route using Flask and flask_smorest, providing a simple endpoint to verify service health.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view handling GET requests to return the health status of the service.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating health status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
